LanguageData.VME_Insectoids_Exalted.stages.0.label: insectoid slain
LanguageData.VME_Insectoids_Exalted.stages.0.descript: I have killed an insectoid being, this is a stain on my soul.
LanguageData.VME_Insectoids_Despised.stages.0.label: insectoid slain
LanguageData.VME_Insectoids_Despised.stages.0.descrip: I have killed an insectoid being, this is a victory!
